items.sentence: I did that without asking for anyone\'s advice.
Some of Tom\'s students speak French very well.
My guess is that Tom isn\'t going to want that.
I heard a strange sound coming from the garage.
She insisted that he should go to the hospital.
Tom took a moment to consider the consequences.
I don\'t think Tom knows Mary can speak French.
I don\'t think Tom knows anybody at our school.
I don\'t think Tom was involved in the scandal.
I don\'t think Tom will ever speak to me again.
